pull_requests.title: BIPs 67 and 301: fix links
pull_requests.body: The original master file has been changed, and the line numbers referenced by the original URL are no longer accurate. Therefore, a fixed permanent link is used to replace it. The purpose of adopting a permanent link is to prevent the line numbers originally pointed to by the URL from becoming inaccurate again when further changes are made to the master branch.

comment_list.body: It would help if this pull request came with a bit of context on how you determined the suggested URLs to be the correct replacement of the originals.

> It would help if this pull request came with a bit of context on how you determined the suggested URLs to be the correct replacement of the originals.

Thanks for your review. I have provided the description.
